00081         /*
00082          *  In order to assign vectors to this object, the member function
00083          *  resize has to be called.
00084          *  Note that the dimension of the code book vectors (not the number of
00085          *  vectors) is automatically adjusted if the function initialized
00086          *  is called.
00087          */
00088     CodeBook( )
00089     {
00090     }
00091 
00093         /*
00094          *  All elements of the vectors are initialized with uniformly
00095          *  distributed pseudo random numbers in order to assign valid values
00096          *  to them. If this is not wanted (e.g. for efficiency reasons) an
00097          *  empty object may be constructed and resized after creation.
00098          *  The function resize never initializes new elements.
00099          */
00100     CodeBook( unsigned num, unsigned dim );
